Package org.spongepowered.api.event.entity.player

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PlayerBreakBlockEvent
    Called when a Player breaks a Location.
    PlayerChangeBlockEvent
    Called when a Player changes a Location.
    PlayerChangeGameModeEvent
    Called when a Player changes GameMode.
    PlayerChangeHealthEvent
    Called when the health of an Entity changes.
    PlayerChangeWorldEvent
    Called when the Player changes World.
    PlayerChatEvent
    Called when a Player sends a chat message.
    PlayerDeathEvent
    Called when a Player is killed.
    PlayerDropItemEvent
    Called when a Player drops an item(s).
    PlayerEnterBedEvent
    Called when a Player enters a bed to sleep in.
    PlayerEquipmentChangeEvent
    Called when an entity changes an equipped item.
    PlayerEvent
    Describes events which contain a Player.
    PlayerExpChangeEvent
    Called when a Player gains or looses experience.
    PlayerHarvestBlockEvent
    Called when a Player harvests a Location.
    PlayerInteractBlockEvent
    Called when a Player interacts with a Location.
    PlayerInteractEntityEvent
    Called when a Player interacts with an Entity.
    PlayerInteractEvent
    Called when a Player interacts with the world.
    PlayerItemConsumeEvent
    An event when a Player consumes an item.
    PlayerJoinEvent
    Called before a Player joins the game.
    PlayerKickEvent
    Called when a Player is kicked.
    PlayerLeaveBedEvent
    Called when a Player leaves a bed.
    PlayerLevelChangeEvent
    Called when a Player's level is changed.
    PlayerMessageEvent
    Describes events where a CommandSource is a Player and has sent a Text message.
    PlayerMoveEvent
    Called when a Player moves.
    PlayerPickUpItemEvent
    An event where a Player is picking up an item.
    PlayerPlaceBlockEvent
    Called when a Player places a BlockType.
    PlayerQuitEvent
    Called when a Player quit the game.
    PlayerResourcePackStatusEvent
    Called when a player notifies the server of the status of a resource pack change request.
    PlayerRespawnEvent
    Called when a player respawns.
    PlayerSleepEvent
    Called when a Player interacts with a bed.
    PlayerUpdateEvent
    Called when a Player is updated.
    UserEvent
    Represents an event that involves a User.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PlayerResourcePackStatusEvent.ResourcePackStatus
    The different possible responses the client can have.
